page.title: 08Little Manor Farm
page.content: The owner of Little Manor Farm is Mr. Arnold. He is a really pleasant man and he makes you feel warm inside. He owns a beautiful house and has a fantastic farm. Mr Arnold collects old carts. He has a selection of different carts. He has 9 well-looked after horses. Some of his horses pull the wedding carts. Mr.Arnold has one cart which he has had since he was 16 years old. He bought it for Â£5.00. It is now worth Â£1,000.He redecorates the carts himself.He also has some bridles which are insured for Â£7,000. Mr Arnold owned Upton Cross Daires for 36 years.It has now been taken over by Unigate. Mr. Arnold gets up at 6.00 am to milk 4 cows. He has 2 eyecatching pheasants. 0ne is a beautiful shimmering gold with hints of blue and green.
